snippet: “Gauguin: Metamorphoses,” at MoMA, is a show that radically reshapes our understanding of that 19th-century painter, but more through prints and objects than through paintings.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Gauguin: Metamorphoses exhibition at Museum of Modern Art.
lead_paragraph: “Gauguin: Metamorphoses,” at MoMA, is a show that radically reshapes our understanding of that 19th-century painter, but more through prints and objects than through paintings.

headline.seo: ‘Gauguin: Metamorphoses’ at MoMA Goes Beyond Paintings
